Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: 1. Understand the Goal: The user wants Python code using pm4pys POWL objects to model a specific business process described in the prompt.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: 2. Analyze the Business Process: Start: Service Request SR verification. After SR: Contract Setup CS must happen. SR -> CS. After CS: Two parallel tasks: Datacenter Allocation DA. Access Control Initialization ACI. After DA and ACI: A loop structure: Base Network Configuration BNC. Debug and Reconfigure DR. After Loop: An exclusive choice: Containerized Deployment CD. Monolithic Deployment MD. After Choice: Final tasks: Quality Assurance QA. Security Audit SA. Final: Go-Live Approval GLA.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: 3. Map to POWL Components: Transitions Activities: sr SR cs CS da DA aci ACI bnc BNC dr DR cd CD md MD qa QA sa SA gla GLA. Operators: loop_node: OperatorPOWL Operator.LOOP children=[bnc dr]. xor_node: OperatorPOWL Operator.XOR children=[cd md]. Partial Orders: nodes = [sr cs da aci loop_node xor_node qa sa gla]. Constructing the Partial Order Edges: 1. sr -> cs 2. cs -> da 3. cs -> aci 4. da -> loop_node 5. aci -> loop_node 6. loop_node -> xor_node 7. xor_node -> qa 8. xor_node -> sa 9. qa -> gla 10. sa -> gla. Self-Correction on Partial Order: The StrictPartialOrder object takes a list of nodes. All nodes involved in the order must be in this list. So nodes=[sr cs da aci loop xor qa sa gla].

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: 4. Drafting the Code: Imports: from pm4py.objects.powl.obj import StrictPartialOrder OperatorPOWL Transition SilentTransition from pm4py.objects.process_tree.obj import Operator. Define Transitions: sr = Transition Service Request cs = Transition Contract Setup da = Transition Datacenter Allocation aci = Transition Access Control Initialization bnc = Transition Base Network Configuration dr = Transition Debug and Reconfigure cd = Transition Containerized Deployment md = Transition Monolithic Deployment qa = Transition Quality Assurance sa = Transition Security Audit gla = Transition Go-Live Approval. Define Operators: loop = OperatorPOWL operator=Operator.LOOP children=[bnc dr] xor = OperatorPOWL operator=Operator.XOR children=[cd md]. Define Partial Order: root = StrictPartialOrder nodes=[sr cs da aci loop xor qa sa gla] root.order.add_edge sr cs cs da cs aci da loop aci loop loop xor xor qa xor sa qa gla sa gla.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: 5. Review against Constraints: Service Request SR -> Transition SR. Contract Setup CS -> Transition CS. Prerequisite after SR. Edge SR->CS. DA and ACI in parallel after CS. Edges CS->DA CS->ACI. Both completed before loop. Edges DA->Loop ACI->Loop. Loop: BNC then optional DR. Operator.LOOP children [BNC DR]. Choice: CD or MD. Operator.XOR children [CD MD]. After deployment choice -> Final tasks. QA and SA concurrent finish before GLA. Edges XOR->QA XOR->SA QA->GLA SA->GLA.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: 6. Refining Variable Names and Labels: Labels should match the prompt descriptions or standard abbreviations. Use the full names or clear abbreviations as labels. Use the prompts abbreviations for variable names but descriptive labels for the Transitions.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: 7. Final Code Structure Check: Are imports correct Yes. Are classes used correctly Yes. Does it cover all steps Yes 1 through 6.
